alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 09 at 3:51PM ChST until January 09 at 5:15PM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CHST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Guam. * WHEN...Until 445 PM ChST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 351 PM ChST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Mangilao, Chalan Pago-Ordot, Yona, Talofofo, Inarajan, Merizo, Piti, Santa Rita and Umatac. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
